comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Zack, you're alive! Wasn't sure if Dave was so engrossed in his Andean adventure that he forgot you. Glad that wasn't the case. Word on the street is you have a challenge for the Frenz. Please, throw down the gauntlet. We're always up to challenges...

comments.author: Zack
comments.body: In response to "fish food" Not quite how I remember it, but I guess I did loose a lot of blood... I think the plot flaw is apparent when I ask my dad for advice. Zack
